Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Nigeria 
    Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in pamphlet by the Onitsa Publishing House of Nigeria on October 1.
 The work, made public on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), is an immortal programme of party building and activities that proudly sums up the glorious history of the WPK which hewed out a new road of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the way of developing the WPK into his party.    
 The pamphlet said in its preface that the foundation and development of the WPK are unthinkable apart from  Kim Il Sung, founder of the party. 
 The WPK led by Kim Jong Il who is identical with  Kim Il Sung in ideology, leadership and trait will always shine as the party of the President, the pamphlet stressed.

Kim Jong Il Sends Gifts to S. Korean Figures 
    Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il sent gifts to families and relatives of Jong Ju Yong, former honorary chairman of Hyundai Group, and Jong Mong Hon, former chairman of Hyundai Asan, and Kim Yun Gyu, president of Hyundai Asan of south Korea, and his party who came to Pyongyang t participate in the opening ceremony of Ryugyong Jong Ju Yong Indoor Stadium.
 The Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee conveyed the gifts to them on Wednesday.

Gift to Kim Jong Il

articles.content:
Federal Formula Supported
    Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The reunification proposal of federal formula is a reasonable and judicious proposal which fully conforms with the desire of the Korean nation to achieve the reunification of the country independently by united efforts of the nation to suit the actual situation of Korea, stressed J. K. Patel, director of the Indian Institute for the Foreign Policy, in his statement published on October 3 on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. He further said:
 Kim Il Sung's cause of national reunification is being vigorously carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il. With an iron will to achieve national reunification as desired by the President, he set the stage for the historical Pyongyang meeting and had the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration adopted.    
 Fully supporting the Korean people's struggle to achieve the independent reunification of the country under the original Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, he expressed firm solidarity for it.

articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Women Leaves to Visit Cuba and Brazil
    Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Democratic Women's Union led by Chairwoman of its Central Committee Pak Sun Hui left here today to visit Cuba and Brazil.
 The delegation was seen off by Ri Yong Hui, vice-chairwoman of its Central Committee, and Esteban Lobaina Romero, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, at the airport.
